title: FairSplit
summary: Scan receipts with OCR and split bills with friends in real time
description: FairSplit is built with Django & Supabase, using OCR to scan receipts for accurate, real-time bill splitting among friends.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Multiplayer
summary: Play Tic-Tac-Toe online with random, invite-only, or AI opponents
description: This React Native & Firebase game supports random matches, invite-only rooms, and easy/hard AI modes, handling room setup, state syncing, and seamless transitions to results.

title: Todo List Full-Stack App
summary: Manage tasks and collaborate with a Next.js frontend and Flask+SQLite backend
description: A full-stack Todo List application featuring task and list management, collaborator invites, and real-time progress tracking, powered by Next.js, Flask, and SQLite.

title: Rollin in Dough eCommerce
summary: Bakery eCommerce with smart carts, payments, and CI/CD workflows
description: Rollin in Dough is a bakery-focused eCommerce platform featuring local & Firestore carts, automatic cart merging on login, Firebase Auth, Square payment integration, token-verified middleware, and full CI/CD workflows.
